game.name: VELTHRA
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Velthra is a low-poly open-world survival adventure where nature is alive, danger evolves, and every choice counts. Gather resources, craft tools, build shelters, explore mysterious civilizations, brave freezing climates, and uncover hidden dungeons—while fighting hunger, wildlife, and time itself.
